articles.title: Katya Adler: What happens if the far right gains in EU elections? - BBC.com
articles.description: Far right parties are forecast to win up to a quarter of European Parliament seats. What would that mean?
articles.content:
The far right is on the march is something you often hear said across Europe right now. This feels like Europe of the 1930s.
So perhaps it is no surprise that with 350 million people across the Euro… [+9809 chars]
